title: Farmers in business
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Efficiency in farming
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Agriculture - Great Britain
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Farm life - Great Britain
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community life
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community organization
description: The role played by farmers' co-operatives in the farming community: illustrated in particular by the progress of one flourishing society established in 1911, and operating in the border country of England and Scotland. Bulk buying and processing, communal marketing, depots for engineers and other supplies, agricultural pharmacies, and such specialised services as aerial spraying are among its many activities.
